column1: Example: <img src="placeholder-image.png data-src="original-image.png"/> In this case 'data-src' - it's a third-party attribute, so you need to prescribe it in the field if you want images with this attribute to be replaced with WebP format.
column2: Example: <img src="placeholder-image.png data-src="original-image.png"/> In this case 'data-src' - it's a third-party attribute, so you need to prescribe it in the field if you want images with this attribute to be replaced with WebP format.

column1:
Multi-Process Optimization significantly boosts the image optimization speed. But it generates extra load to the server as well. We recommend first to run the test image optimization process with the 'multi-process' ON and monitor your server performance.

The 'Multi-Process Generation' feature needs the php extension 'pcntl' to be installed on the server. If you enable the feature and no performance boost happens, plase ask your hoster/system administrator to check if the 'pcntl' extension installed.
column2:
Multi-Process Optimization significantly boosts the image optimization speed. But it generates extra load to the server as well. We recommend first to run the test image optimization process with the 'multi-process' ON and monitor your server performance.

The 'Multi-Process Generation' feature needs the php extension 'pcntl' to be installed on the server. If you enable the feature and no performance boost happens, plase ask your hoster/system administrator to check if the 'pcntl' extension installed.

column1: The more parallel processes are set, the faster is the image optimization process, as well as the higher is the server load
column2: The more parallel processes are set, the faster is the image optimization process, as well as the higher is the server load

column1: Optimize Images for Enabled Products Only
column2: Optimize Images for Enabled Products Only

column1: Use User Agent for Loading Images
column2: Use User Agent for Loading Images

column1:
Using user Agent allows to apply such features as Smart Optimization+Resize together with the Lazy Load feature for the same image as well as to set the number of preloaded images separately for desktop and mobile views.

There could be a situation, when User Agent doesn’t work properly for some reasons and should be switched OFF. In this case only preloaded images can be served with Smart Optimization+Resize features while Lazy Load is enabled. And if Lazy Load feature is disabled all images can be served with Smart Optimization+Resize features.
column2:
Using user Agent allows to apply such features as Smart Optimization+Resize together with the Lazy Load feature for the same image as well as to set the number of preloaded images separately for desktop and mobile views.

There could be a situation, when User Agent doesn’t work properly for some reasons and should be switched OFF. In this case only preloaded images can be served with Smart Optimization+Resize features while Lazy Load is enabled. And if Lazy Load feature is disabled all images can be served with Smart Optimization+Resize features.

column2: Enabling the setting will automatically optimize newly uploaded images.

column1: For correct work, please make sure that the 'Automatically Optimize Newly Uploaded Images' setting is enabled in the general configuration.
column2: For correct work, please make sure that the 'Automatically Optimize Newly Uploaded Images' setting is enabled in the general configuration.

column1: When a user uses a mobile or tablet device it's no worth to load a high-resolution image on a small display. Using the feature an image with appropriate size will be uploaded, making the upload process faster and positively impacting the Google rank for mobile.
column2: When a user uses a mobile or tablet device it's no worth to load a high-resolution image on a small display. Using the feature an image with appropriate size will be uploaded, making the upload process faster and positively impacting the Google rank for mobile.

column1: The extension will create a copy of every image in suitable for mobile or tablet size. Please make sure that you have enough disc space on your server.
column2: The extension will create a copy of every image in suitable for mobile or tablet size. Please make sure that you have enough disc space on your server.

column1: Resize - the image will be resized proportionally to the original size. Simply it will be the same picture, but smaller in pixels. Crop - when cropping a photo, you cut the part of an image changing its width. While the height of the image would be the same. In the result the cropped image will look like the part of the original picture
column2: Resize - the image will be resized proportionally to the original size. Simply it will be the same picture, but smaller in pixels. Crop - when cropping a photo, you cut the part of an image changing its width. While the height of the image would be the same. In the result the cropped image will look like the part of the original picture

column1: When WebP format is used the extension will create a copy for every image in the WebP format. Please make sure that you have enough disc space on your server.
column2: When WebP format is used the extension will create a copy for every image in the WebP format. Please make sure that you have enough disc space on your server.

column1: WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy compression for images on the web. Using WebP, webmasters and web developers can create smaller, richer images that make the web faster. WebP lossless images are 26% smaller in size compared to PNGs. WebP lossy images are 25-34% smaller than comparable JPEG images at equivalent SSIM quality index.
column2: WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy compression for images on the web. Using WebP, webmasters and web developers can create smaller, richer images that make the web faster. WebP lossless images are 26% smaller in size compared to PNGs. WebP lossy images are 25-34% smaller than comparable JPEG images at equivalent SSIM quality index.
